# Project Guidelines

This is a high-performance Next.js portfolio website with the following requirements:

## Design Principles
- Follow modern UI/UX best practices for typography, spacing, colors, and layout
- Prioritize clarity over cleverness â€” UI must first communicate
- Use restraint, contrast, and purpose in design decisions
- Maintain consistent spacing and pixel-perfect alignment
- Implement smooth, subtle animations that feel intentional
- Ensure responsive design across all devices

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- GSAP for complex animations
- Framer Motion for micro-interactions
- Lucide React for icons

## Performance Requirements
- Optimize images and assets
- Implement lazy loading where appropriate
- Use Next.js Image component for all images
- Minimize bundle size
- Ensure fast loading times

## Animation Guidelines
- Use GSAP for text reveal animations
- Animations should be felt, not noticed
- Smooth transitions between states
- Respect user's motion preferences

## Code Quality
- Use TypeScript strictly
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Implement proper error handling
- Use semantic HTML
- Ensure accessibility compliance
